subject: Simsonn Plus X Problem
description_text:
Hello,
i have a Problem with my Plus X Pedal. They are only 1 month old but now
they are not working in games anymore.
You can see on the screenshot that in the Simsonn App they are shown as
connected, and i can calibrate them, they are only working in this app.
But Windows doesnt recognize them as a Game Controller, so i can not use
them in Games.
can you help me?

conversations.body_text: i tried restarting multiple times, and also testing every other USB Port on the Mainboard, still same problem
Hi Markus Ihl,    Are there any pop-up prompts after entering the software device interface? Also, when you step on the pedal, is there any data fluctuation at the location indicated by the arrow?

No pop-ups, and yes when I press the pedal it shows in the simsonn software
Am 7. Aug. 2025, 05:40 +0200 schrieb service@simsonn.com
Hi Markus Ihl,    Please manually flash the firmware in the settings interface according to this video. If that doesn't work, select the plus x old upgrade file to upgrade.
